arts.ttl: Furious Bastian Schweinsteiger blasts 'really BAD' Germany after their shock 2-0 defeat by Slovakia - as he tears into Florian Wirtz, Nick Woltemade and Co
arts.sum: Germany had been tipped to finish top of their group, which also includes Northern Ireland and Luxembourg, and were backed to win their first match with the likes of Florian Wirtz in action.

arts.ttl: World Cup qualifying: Germany shocked in Slovakia, but Northern Irish enjoy win
arts.sum: Germans lose first ever away qualifier in 52 matches Spain and Belgium ease to comfortable victories Four-time world champions Germany suffered their first away loss in a World Cup qualifier after their shock 2-0 defeat by hosts Slovakia in Bratislava on Thursday in Group A. The Germans, who have set a goal of winning the 2026 World Cup, had never before lost a World Cup qualifier on the road in 52 matches, and they have now lost their last three consecutive games, after defeats by Portugal and France in the Nations League in June. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland go top of Group A as Germany shocked by Slovakia
arts.sum: Northern Ireland are top of Group A after as group favourites Germany were shocked by Slovakia in the opening games of World Cup qualifying.

arts.ttl: Nagelsmann blasts Germany’s lack of intensity in shock loss to Slovakia
arts.sum: Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann has criticized his team for a lack of fight in their 2-0 defeat to Slovakia.

arts.ttl: Germany stunned by Slovakia in rare World Cup qualifying loss. Spain and Belgium win
arts.sum: The loss in Slovakia was also only the second time Germany lost a World Cup qualifier by more than one goal. Germany lost an away World Cup qualifying game for the first time in a 2-0 upset against Slovakia on Thursday which threw its campaign to reach the 2026 tournament into immediate jeopardy.

arts.ttl: Slovakia stun Germany in World Cup qualifying opener
arts.sum: Slovakia beat Germany 2-0 in a surprising result of the World Cup qualifiers.
Full Germany player ratings from Thursday's World Cup qualifier against Slovakia.

arts.ttl: Slovakia vs Germany – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Slovakia and Germany go head-to-head in FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifying on Thursday. Both sides will be eager to get their campaign off to a winning start in Group A, which also features Northern Ireland and Luxembourg.
